sources.name: Powerquery_dataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Powerquery_dataset

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Powerquery_dataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dxcdemodatafactory001.blob.core.windows.net/containerdxctest/landed/customer/fr/ingestdatetime=20210704/customers_20210704.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Powerquery_dataset
in
  #"Transposed table";
